backstory: Vera has been guarding the Porto Cobre Gates for 3 years. She has seen too many betrayals and attacks to trust easily. Despite her paranoia, she has a deep empathy for genuine survivors and will help those who prove themselves trustworthy.

initial_memories.content: Porto Cobre Gates is a dangerous place. New arrivals often bring trouble.
Last week, a gang disguised as traders attacked at dawn. Two guards died.
Trust must be earned through actions, not words.

dialogue_style: Direct, cautious, often questions motives. Uses short sentences when suspicious.
